document.description: Addington has won 16 Cup races as a crew chief ... after he pulled out of a gas station and into a fast-food restaurant. ... Eldora Speedway | Long Pond | NHRA Funny Car | ...

Stories about: Slugger Labbe Browse: Index of reporters 51437466 | 226d ago Steve Addington officially named Tony Stewart's crew chief By Chad Leistikow , USA TODAY Addington has won 16 Cup races as a crew chief, including four in the past two years while managing combustible driver Kurt Busch. FIND MORE STORIES IN: Tony Stewart | Carl Edwards | Hendrick Motorsports | Kurt Busch | Jeff Burton | Joe Gibbs Racing | Richard Childress Racing | David Ragan | Homestead-Miami Speedway | Roush Fenway Racing | Rick Hendrick | Darian Grubb | Steve Addington | Slugger Labbe | Drew Blickensderfer 50435694 | 299d ago NASCAR to investigate Gordon's claims against Menard By Nate Ryan , USA TODAY NASCAR is investigating Jeff Gordon's charge that Paul Menard might have spun intentionally to help teammate Kevin Harvick win. FIND MORE STORIES IN: Nascar | Jimmie Johnson | Jeff Gordon | Kevin Harvick | Matt Kenseth | Hendrick Motorsports | Formula One | Clint Bowyer | Richard Childress Racing | Paul Menard | Richmond International Raceway | Rusty Wallace | Chicagoland Speedway | Richard Childress | Michael Waltrip Racing | Mike Helton | Jimmy Spencer | Speed Channel | Sirius Satellite Radio | Mike Dillon | Slugger Labbe nascar | 7/31/2006 5:26:22 PM ET Crew chiefs released at Robert Yates Racing The turmoil at Robert Yates Racing continued Monday when crew chiefs Tommy Baldwin and Slugger Labbe were both released from their contracts. Yates gave no reason for the crew chief departures, announcing only that Cully Barraclough would take over Sadler's team and Butch Hylton will be in charge of Jarrett's team beginning with this Sunday's race at Indy. FIND MORE STORIES IN: Toyota Motor Corporation | Indianapolis Motor Speedway | Elliott Sadler | Busch | David Gilliland | Evernham Motorsports | Robert Yates Racing | Bill Davis Racing | Cup Series | Jarrett | Stephen Leicht | Tommy Baldwin |
